name: Amelia's Curse
detailed_description:
Venture through the depths of an abandoned castle to uncover the untold secrets of Amelia's Curse.

Amelia's Curse is a first-person shooter built from the ground up for Virtual Reality. Experience environments ranging from murky mining shafts to deep sewers where enemies linger in the dark waiting for their chance to strike.

Features:

Free exploration

Stand-still wave shooters are a thing of the past. With Amelia's Curse, you explore massive levels that can be retraced at any point in time to find loot and other hidden experiences.

Survival Horror

You must stock up on ammo, upgrades, and more as you scavenge throughout the vast levels of the castle.

Terrifying ambiance and monsters

Every level and enemy has been designed to create more fear than any VR shooter out there.

Upgrade your gear between levels

Replayability is a key feature in Amelia's Curse. Between levels and playthroughs, you can upgrade many aspects of your character to increase your survival time.

Weapon Customization

Nearly every weapon you purchase in-game has a special ultimate ability that can be used to take out large hordes of monsters very quickly.

Swarmed by enemies

Forget seeing the same zombies over and over again. Experience procedurally-generated monsters and flying spiders that get more difficult as you progress.

Realistic low-poly graphics

Optimization is huge for VR, but often at the cost of the graphical experience. With Amelia's Curse, you will experience a great frame rate with no graphical sacrifice, as every artistic aspect has been designed specifically for high-resolution displays.

Hidden Story

Find and collect Amelia's paper notes scattered along the way to gain personal insight towards her plight. What exactly happened in that castle?

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
